name: Piplets
description:
Piplets is a singleplayer farming game, in which the player tends to their crops to earn money by selling crops and items made using the resources they grow. As the days go by you can discover more about the world through the piplets you encounter - these little friends will follow you around and may even let you in on how the world ended up the way it is...

Playtest form: https://forms.gle/poVFT4Fty5gkM4gU6
